Uses of Class
com.sr2.flopbox.model.Server

Packages that use Server
Package Description
com.sr2.flopbox.controller
Contains all the resources accessible throughout the FlopBox application.
com.sr2.flopbox.service
Contains all the logic of the different resources available through the Rest FlopBox API

    Method used to return the server requested by the client based on its alias
    Server ServerService.updateServer​(String alias, Server server)
    Synchronized method allowing only one thread to update a server on the database(file).
